snippet.title: Cardpocalypse Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Cardpocalypse is a single-player card game where you change the cards and the rules as you play, delivered within a charming school-based narrative.
From Gambrinous, creators of Guild of Dungeoneering. Find out more: http://cardpocalyp.se

Cardpocalypse song composed by Tommy Buckley (https://twitter.com/tommybuckley_1)
Song performed by Jason Paige (https://jasonpaige.com/) - you may recognise Jason's voice from the Pokemon theme tune!
Character voices by Maya Tuttle (https://www.voices.com/talent/stories/maya-tuttle)
